About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Tues and Fri 9am-3pm; closed school holidays. General reference assistance and general copying services available. Copies of audio and video tapes available.

About.Access: 2-3 days' advance notice of visit required. Closed period of 30 years applies to most records.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relevant to the School and its environment including memorabilia; publications by members of the School community.

About.Major holdings: Board of Trustee: Minutes, correspondence 1835- . Headmasters office: Policies, correspondence 1835- . Associated Organisations: Minutes, correspondence. Photographs, press clippings, architectural drawings.
